constituent: encourage, Wimbledon, cliff, ten thousand, power, muscle, arnold
koohiiStory1: 10,000 Persians are at the base of the cliff, but the leader of the 300 Spartans just flexes his huge muscles and encourages his men by shouting that they have the power to fight them all.
koohiiStory2: People encourage you, giving you the power so you can dive off the 10,000m high cliff into the sea.
myStory: cổ vũ, kích thích. chữ Lệ. lực hàng vạn dưới mái chéo.
readingExamples: 励ます (はげ.ます), 励む (はげ.む)
words: to encourage, to cheer, to raise (the voice)
to be zealous, to brace oneself, to endeavour, to strive, to make an effort
